caption.center: SAMMIE R. WILSON, Personal Representative of the Estate of Ann Louise
Wilson, Deceased, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. DIANE PLYLER, M.D., and MT.

opinion.opinion_text:
Actions on Applications for Leave to Appeal from the Court of Appeals.
Leave to Appeal Denied September 10, 2007:
I would grant leave to appeal to consider Waltz vWyse, 469 Mich 642 (2004).
